name: Finestt
description: Great stuff coming soon. Looking for remote software developers.

jobs.title: Full stack developer (NodeJS, React)
jobs.description:
We are looking for
80% developer 20% product manager. An efficient full stack developer that will not only build the product but be great at deciding the product roadmap as well. If you’ve been in one of the fast-growing startups and want to create the next big thing then this may be for you.

Proven track record in:
- Shipping 3 products that you’ve built and scaled
- Create product roadmaps based on company OKRs
- Hiring and managing other developers

What’s in it for you?
- Double digits equity in the startup
- Great salary
- Chance, good timing and resources to build a rocketship startup.

Principles
- Courage
- Extreme focus
- Aggressive growth

Management
- Hierarchical
- North star metric
- OKRs

jobs.title: Senior Android Developer
jobs.description:
About us
We are building a better way to buy and sell cars. A young startup that’s on track to build an ecosystem for the automotive industry in MENA. Classified websites like OLX have served us for a long time and will continue to do so, but we strongly believe there should be a much better solution for helping people find the right car. That’s why we are building a solution from scratch, specifically for cars. And we are looking for people who believe that a strong deep tech company can be established in the region, one that will be focused on innovation and fast growth. At the moment we are 100% remote.

We are looking for 
Engineers that love to create great products - apps that are super fast, delight people and have a big impact in the daily lives of millions. Your code is simple and you don’t like to over-engineer solutions. You care about making the product easier to use for people not about shipping more lines of code or features. We value outcome vs output. 

Minimum qualifications:
- BS degree in Computer Science or similar technical field and min 5 years work experience.
- Strong experience developing consumer-facing high-performance Android applications
- Shipping at least 5 apps to the app store that you’ve built and maintained. 
- Experience with Kotlin and RxJava
- Advanced knowledge of Java.
- Knowledge of material design patterns
- Experience developing accessible technologies(low bandwidth lite apps etc).
- Interest and ability to learn other coding languages as needed.

Bonus points:
- If you’ve been in a fast-growing startup before.
- Master’s, Ph.D. degree, further education in engineering, computer science or related field.

What’s in it for you? 
Equity in the startup 
Opportunity, good timing, and resources to build a rocketship startup. 
Access to world-class advisors: ex-Google, Uber etc

Principles 
- Courage 
- Extreme focus 
- Aggressive growth

Interview process:
1. Initial Zoom video call screen
2. A take-home code test with a call to review your solution
3. And a paid workday interview.

Note: please have ready min 3 reference contacts(emails and phone numbers) from previous employers.
